document.discussion_title: 36V/48V Electric Hub Motor for Balanceable Vehicle
document.topic_text: E. Promise is A Promise.FAQ1.Q:Before place a order,how can i choose ?A:Please specify the wheel diameter size,width,voltage,power and no-load speed of the required wheel motor.2.Q:Could I take samples to test quality and market in advance?A:Yes, welcome to take samples to test our quality and service.3.Q:What's the total cost for samples?A:Total sample cost= sample cost + freightWe will give u the best shipping cost after knowing the wheel size, battery needed or not .4.Q:How do you ship samples?A:Considering sample quantity is not big, we support ship samples by EMS,TNT or Fedex , fast and less damages.5.Q:What's your minimum order quantity:A:10sets, one or two samples are ok .6.Q:Could I use my own forwarder?A:Yes7.Q:I am new to international business,could you find an experienced forwarder to organize shipment for us?A:Yes, we will assist and guild you to work out the shipping and import process.8.Q:Is the sample same with formal orders?A:Yes, sample's specification, performance, quality are totally same with formal orders.9.Q:What's your delivery time?A:For samples: within 7days; For orders: within 25days.Contact Sunlight1,Your client satisfied on the right schedule and quality;2,You can get good reputation from your market and obtain more orders;3,Our professional service before and after sale;4,The reasonable and competitive price;5,Service is excellent.Any questions from you are welcome and will be replied in 24 hours.6,Delivery on time
